tab1.text1:
Embark on an Epic Adventure in our ASA PvE Cluster!

Enjoy a balanced and immersive Ark experience with custom features and an inviting community. Perfect for both seasoned survivors and newcomers!

<TextStyle.Green>Mythic Paradis Cluster Maps:</>
- The Island
- Scorched Earth
- The Center
- Svartalfheim
More coming soon!

<TextStyle.Green>Events & Community:</>
Regular events with rewards. Join our Discord to get all news.

<TextStyle.Green>Rules & Guidelines:</>
To ensure a fun and fair environment for everyone, please join our Discord to read the full list of server rules and guidelines. Your cooperation helps us maintain a welcoming and enjoyable community!
tab1.text2:
<TextStyle.Green>Server Settings:</>
- XP: 2x
- Taming: 10x
- Harvest: 5x
- Incubation: 10x
- Maturation: 10x
- Imprint Interval: 0.1x (48m)
- Imprint Quality: 15x
- Max Wild Level: 150 (Wyverns 190)

<TextStyle.Green>Mods:</>
- Mythical Costumes
- Arkitect Structures Remastered
- Ark Shop
- Cybers Structures QoL+
- Automated Ark
- S-Dino Variants
- Better Breeding
- Dino Depot
- Alfa Oceanic Platforms
- Awesome Teleporters
- Super Spyglass Plus
- Solo Farm
- Shiny! Dinos Ascended
- RR-Potions
- Custom Creature Levels
